alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 1:20PM MST until January 07 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 11 PM MST SUNDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snowfall above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Dripping Springs and Globe/Miami. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 11 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 10 above zero could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
